other_tests.findings: Showed sigmoid diverticulosis but was otherwise normal.

other_tests.procedure_name: CT Abdomen and Pelvis with Contrast
other_tests.findings: An 8.0 cm segment of sigmoid colon exhibits diffuse wall thickening and adjacent fat stranding consistent with diverticulitis, and a 1.6 x 1.5 cm intramural focal fluid collection compatible with an intramural abscess.
